text:
This album lists all talks that you have downloaded to your device. Downloaded talks are highlighted in red.

For each talk, the fields  on the right indicate the date and duration of the talk.

Select a talk to play it.

If you wish to share or favorite a particular talk, or add a note or download it, or remove the talk from local storage, slide your finger on the talk right to left. This will bring up a menu that will allow you do these operations.
